title: Anthropic's Claude 4 Sets New Record on Multi-Step Reasoning Tasks
summary: Anthropic released Claude 4 Opus, which achieves 92% on complex multi-step planning benchmarks, demonstrating improved agentic capabilities.
author: Mike Press

title: Meta Announces Open-Source Multimodal Model with 1M Context Window
summary: Meta AI released Llama 4, an open-source model supporting text, images, and video with a 1 million token context window.
author: Lisa Tech
